title: How to Unmark an Email as Spam in AOL

steps.headline: Read How to Mark an Email as Spam in AOL.
Follow the instructions up to Step 3.
Go to the Spam folder at this point.
steps.description: Your spam folder should be in the left-hand scrolling box, along with 'Inbox', 'Sent', etc.

steps.headline: When you get to the email you wish to unmark as spam, click Unmark as Spam button.
steps.description: You have successfully unmarked an email as spam!

text: Read How to Mark an Email as Spam in AOL.  Follow the instructions up to Step 3.  Go to the Spam folder at this point. Your spam folder should be in the left-hand scrolling box, along with 'Inbox', 'Sent', etc. When you get to the email you wish to unmark as spam, click Unmark as Spam button. You have successfully unmarked an email as spam!
sentences: Read How to Mark an Email as Spam in AOL.
Follow the instructions up to Step 3.
Go to the Spam folder at this point.
Your spam folder should be in the left-hand scrolling box, along with 'Inbox', 'Sent', etc.
When you get to the email you wish to unmark as spam, click Unmark as Spam button.
You have successfully unmarked an email as spam!
